metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11232 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The etm_setup_aux function indrivers/hwtracing/coresight/coresight-etm-perf.c in the Linux kernel before4.10.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (panic) because aparameter is incorrectly used as a local variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-azure package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
